description:
Taken at sunset on July 10, 2021 in the desert of Twentynine Palms, California. The thermometer hit 117 degrees that day, one of the hottest days on record in the state. No filter was added, it really was that damn hot.

All artist proceeds for this image go toward supporting NiftyFilm.io, the only resource on the internet dedicated to educating and empowering independent filmmakers to take full advantage of the power of NFTs to disseminate their work, build an audience, and foster community.

4000x3000 JPEG

Photo by Jason Charnick.
